question: ./img/intermediate_q1.jpg
hint: The artist was involved in a lot of controversies due to his modern style of painting nudes.

question: ./img/intermediate_q2.jpg
hint: The artist was one of the pioneers of the style known as fauvism, coming from the word "Fauves", French for wild beasts.

question: ./img/intermediate_q3.jpg
hint: This eccentric master of surrealism was expelled from art school, twice.

question: ./img/intermediate_q4.jpg
hint: Although the artist considered one of the greatest of all time, only 36 paintings authenticated by him, exist in the world.

question: ./img/intermediate_q5.jpg
hint: The artist combined imagery and text to question the viewers perception and understanding about reality.
